definitions.definition: To burst or split open at definite places, discharging seeds , pollen or similar content.
examples: Anthers dehisce when the flower opens.

definitions.definition: To rupture or break open, as a surgical wound .
examples: A surgical wound may partially or completely dehisce after surgery, depending upon whether some or all of the layers of tissue come open.

main_definition: ( intransitive , botany ) To burst or split open at definite places, discharging seeds , pollen or similar content.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , medicine ) To rupture or break open, as a surgical wound .
